title: Index II Specification
description: Content and formatting specification for the output of the NLP tool.

VARIABLE_ACC.description: The unique identifier for a variable

ENTITY_OF_INTEREST.description: The entity of interest from the variable description.

SEMANTIC_TYPE.description: The type of the entity of interest, e.g. disease, drug, etc.

UMLS_CUI.description: A concept unique identifier used in the Unified Medical Language System.

UMLS_CUI_ASSERTION.description: These are annotation qualifiers, e.g. present, absent, possible, rare, etc.

CONCEPT_SCORE.description: This is a measure of the likelihood that the concept is correctly applied.

UMLS_LINKS.description: A list of CURIES that are linked to the UMLS CUI.
